bool BitBuffer_GetNextBit ( BitBuffer_t *  Buffer  ) 

Function to retrieve the next bit stored in the given bit buffer.

void BitBuffer_Init ( BitBuffer_t *  Buffer  ) 

Circular bit buffer library. This will allow for individual bits to be stored in packed form inside circular buffers, to reduce overall RAM usage. Function to initialize or reset a bit buffer, ready for data to be stored into it.

void BitBuffer_StoreNextBit ( BitBuffer_t *  Buffer,
bool  Bit

Function to store the given bit into the given bit buffer.
